entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who is having a conversation with Dumbledore's portrait. He is wearing robes and swinging a traveling cloak over them.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person whose portrait is speaking to Snape. The portrait is advising Snape on what to do.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is a person who will receive the sword from Snape. Dumbledore's portrait believes Potter knows what to do with it.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is a person whose mishap has affected Snape's appearance.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who rises out of the Pensieve and lies on the carpeted floor in the same room as Snape.

relationships.description: Snape and Dumbledore's portrait are having a conversation about giving Potter the sword.
George Weasley's mishap has affected Snape's appearance.
Dumbledore believes Potter knows what to do with the sword.
Snape and Harry are in the same room.
